document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">Exultation </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">going </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">inland </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">soul </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">sea, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">Past </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">houses </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">past </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">headlands, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Into </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">deep </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">Eternity </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">Bred </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">among </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">mountains, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">sailor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">understand </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">divine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">intoxication </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">first </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff6c8e">league </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">out </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">land? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Exultation is the going
